attributes.action: Better working conditions for this trucker
attributes.additional_details: After approaching the management of my employers both formally and informally, my request for better working conditions have been ignored. With the workload and hours that I put have to deal with, I believe that I should be supplied with a Scania topline R730. I as the employee will supply all associated accessories but I find it hard to operate under the current circumstances.

rejection.details: This is a matter for discussion between you and your employer; or you may wish to raise it with a trade union representative or ACAS.
